value.title: Paginated Report Visual in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more interesting video from Power BI June 2021 feature updates. So, excited to announce that the long-anticipated paginated report visual for Power BI reports is now available in Power BI Desktop as a public preview. Yes, during this video we will talk about Paginated Report Visual in

value.title: Power BI Goals - Create Scorecard and Manual Goals in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to the Power BI Goals Step by Step Beginner tutorial series, During this session, we will talk about how to create Scorecard and Manual Goals in Power BI. To get started with Goals we need to create a Scorecard in Power BI. Once ou scorecard is created, we can add the Goals within the same scorecard.

value.title: Quickly create Power BI Report from SharePoint List  or Microsoft List
value.excerpt: We will learn how to quickly create our Power BI Report directly from SharePoint List or Microsoft Lists during this session. This is the first integration experience with Power BI. This experience empowers SharePoint list and Microsoft List users to easily explore their list data with just a few clicks.

value.title: Quickly create Power BI reports in Power BI Service
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session to demonstrate the new feature which is just been rolled out by Microsoft. Now, we can quickly create reports using the Power BI Service itself. We don’t need to open the Power BI Desktop for the same. This new feature is being rolled out from December 2020 Power BI

value.title: Show Multiple X Axis Value By Hierarchy in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI September 2022 Feature Summary. During this video we will learn how we can show multiple X-axis value as hierarchy in Power BI. value.title: Sort a table using Multiple Columns in Power BI | Multi Column Sort in Power  BI
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, how we can sort a tale using multiple columns for the table visualization in Power BI. value.title: Sort Legend in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI Tips and Tricks Video. This is a short and sweet video demonstrating the functionality to apply Sort on Legend values in Power BI. We can now adjust the sort direction for items in our legends! This will also help to reorder some of the data in visuals like stacked column charts,

value.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily
value.excerpt: Sometimes you need Power BI support. Even if you know a lot about Power BI, everyone has a brain fart from time to time. Adam looks at 5 different ways you can get Power BI support to get you past your hurdle.  Community Site: https://community.powerbi.com Twitter Hashtag: #PowerBI and #pbihelp Facebook
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OK9i3tuzUMc" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

images.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily

value.title: Add a domain to your Power BI tenant (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can add a domain to your Power BI tenant. This is done by adding the domain through Azure Active Directory or Office 365.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Another Power BI optimization tool - Report Analyzer
value.excerpt: Already optimized your data model and still having some performance issues in Power BI? Check out Michael Kovalsky's Report Analyzer tool to inspect your report.   Michael Kovalsky: https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelkovalsky/  Michael Kovalsky's blog: https://www.elegantbi.com/  Report Analyzer https://www.elegantbi.com/post/reportanalyzer

value.title: Answering your datamart questions
value.excerpt: You've got a LOT of questions about datamarts in Power BI! Adam answers a few that we've seen popping up. Giving his thoughts on these questions.  Introduction to datamarts https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/datamarts/datamarts-overview  Comparing dataflows to datamarts https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/datamarts/datamarts-overview#comparing-dataflows-to-datamarts

value.title: Answering your Power BI Premium Per User Questions

PPU Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dEgR2_xi3mw  PPU FAQ: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-premium-per-user-faq

value.title: Are you backing up your Power BI Dataset???
value.excerpt: While Power BI is a SaaS service, backing up your dataset is still important. What if something was accidently deleted? How do you recover it? Patrick shows you how you can get a backup / restore process in place so you can sleep at night.  Backup/Restore PowerShell Script: https://guyinacu.be/backuprestorescript
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RbMFQNthlGM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Are you using the right Dataflows connector in Power BI???
value.excerpt: Did you know that there are two Dataflows connectors in Power BI? What's the difference? Adam takes a look and explains what is going on.  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next level? value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx
